Product.Name: Paddle Brush Black
Product.Description: The first step for handling healthy tresses is a paddle brush that works for you, not against you. Start your morning routine off right by building a strong haircare foundation. Air-cushioned padding, micro-beaded tips, and super-flex bristles separate locks and prevent damage and breakage to hair, promoting growth. Anti-static and an anti-microbial design prep hair for heat styling and tough detangling.

Product.Name: Hydro Punch Conditioner
Product.Description: Moroccan argan oil has long since been used as a secret weapon to condition hair to the highest levels possible, imparting shine and glow from within. NuMe has taken the hydrating properties of argan oil and paired the mineral-rich potion with a patented technology full of essential fatty acids and protein, Seratin-K. Natural bamboo also fortifies each lock, and jojoba oil and vitamin E instantly detangle and increase softness.

Product.Name: Hydro Punch Shampoo
Product.Description: Moroccan argan oil, also known as liquid gold, is nature’s most effective hydrator. Paired with this nourishing element is NuMe’s exclusive patented technology, Seratin-K. Seratin-K is full of proteins that bind to hair and provide strength and moisture from the inside-out. Powerful antioxidant agents mend extreme damage caused by weather and harsh chemicals. Vitamin E and jojoba oil work together for a healthy, vibrant shine.

Product.Name: Moisturizing Conditioner
Product.Description: Treat your locks to a serious shot of moisture and hydration. NuMe’s exclusive conditioning formula promotes natural elasticity and flexibility, thanks to nourishing soy protein and olive fruit oil, which allow moisture to bind to the hair cuticle. Replenish lost moisture and increase elasticity, flexibility, softness, and radiance with each use.

Product.Name: Pentacle
Product.Description: Engineers work around the clock to find and incorporate the most powerful materials into every NuMe styling tool. The latest innovation, a crushed gemstone tourmaline-infused ceramic coated barrel, adds luxury to your beauty routine, and the ultimate in hair protection and shine. Make deep waves and mermaid-style tresses a reality with this first-of-its kind waver, crimper, and curling iron in one. Heat-resistant glove included.

Product.Name: Thermal Pouch
Product.Description: Styling tools as important as your NuMe collection need pouches that offer superior protection, as well as express your unique style. Both flexible and useful, the Thermal Pouch can slip into your purse for storage and when you’re ready to style, it opens up to become a thermal protecting mat that supports your tool, anywhere and anytime. The thermal protecting mat can hold up to two hot tools simultaneously.

Product.Name: Styling Comb
Product.Description: A professional stylist’s most important hair-prep tool, the Styling Comb features flexible teeth along with anti-static and heat resistant properties that work together to secure impeccable shine and manageability. The heat-resistant comb is designed for sectioning, detangling, and teasing using its pull-through feature.

Product.Name: Ionic Round Brush
Product.Description: Not all brushes are created equal. You want an ionic round brush that gives you 100x glossier, thicker, and healthier-looking locks. With bristles that emit negative ions, the hair cuticle closes and natural moisture is sealed in, preventing environmental and everyday styling damage and making hair smooth, less frizzy, and static-free. Use with the Signature Dryer, also made with negative ion technology, to maximize the appearance of healthy hair.

Product.Name: Silhouette
Product.Description: To NuMe, the right way to enter a room is with jaw-dropping style and confidence. The Silhouette, made of pure ceramic, gives you the confidence of knowing your hair looks beautiful and healthy, because it is. Pure ceramic means quick heat and high glide-through properties, resulting in zero tugging and pulling and less passes of the iron through the hair. Pin-straight tresses or flowing, soft curls can be yours through the versatility of its rounded plates.

Product.Name: Petite
Product.Description: For the girl-on-the-go, the Petite is the perfect straightening travel companion for short styles, smoothing bangs, or taming flyaways. Boost volume, create texture in a pixie cut, or keep bobs smooth and frizz-free. Add luxury to your routine with crushed tourmaline gemstones and the strength of ceramic plates. The Petite packs the same powerful punch as full-sized flat irons, just in a smaller package.

Product.Name: Hair Dryer Diffuser
Octowand
Product.Description: Eight interchangeable wands. Endless style possibilities. <br> You’re never at a loss for ways to style with the NuMe Octowand. Unleash your inner curl maven with eight interchangeable heat barrels to create styles from loose mermaid waves to defined curls. Octowand’s clipless heat barrels are tourmaline-infused and ceramic coated, penetrating the hair with 600% more negative ions to lock in natural moisture, add luminous shine, and keep your curls beautiful all day. The must-have Octowand offers an easy-to-read digital temperature control and heats up to 450 degrees for professional styling results.

Product.Name: Classic Wand 32mm
Product.Description: NuMe’s exclusive curling wand forms beautiful, romantic waves in half the time of other styling tools, with an added luxury, a gemstone tourmaline-infused ceramic coated barrel. Tourmaline and ceramic heat hair quickly and evenly, resulting in zero damage and a healthy shine. Negative ions are disbursed through the barrel, conditioning hair from the inside-out and creating manageability necessary for precision styling.

Product.Name: Classic Wand 25mm
Product.Description: NuMe’s original and highest performing curling wand creates runway-worthy, enviable curls and imparts incredible shine and softness. Negative ions disbursed through tourmaline-infused ceramic coated barrels create a healthy, glossy look. The 25mm Classic Wand allows you to create full curls, beach waves and cool-girl texture. Perfect on medium length or long hair, the 25mm is best for adding volume.

Product.Name: Classic Wand Reverse
Product.Description: Always one to be on the cutting edge of technology and the latest trends, NuMe has constructed the highest-performing styling tool yet, and the result? Professional-looking, free flowing mermaid-style waves are now your reality.

Product.Name: Massaging Brush
Product.Description: A massaging brush specifically designed to promote healthy hair growth and luminous shine by stimulating the scalp through vibration, which increases blood circulation. Dual-speed settings and contoured nodes on each side of the Massaging Brush work to relieve stress and muscle fatigue simultaneously, resulting in long, glossy and healthy hair with regular use.

Product.Name: Curl Jam
Product.Description: NuMe, a leading force in breakthrough technology and luxury, has engaged the opulence of the crushed gemstone tourmaline and paired it with powerful negative ions to dramatically smooth each lock of hair, crafting curls and straight styles to perfection. Indulge in a rich styling experience with the advantage of never having to choose. NuMe delivers four precision styling tools in one complete package.

Product.Name: Classic Wand Pearl
Product.Description: NuMe engineers craft cutting-edge tools with hair health and beauty at the forefront of design. And now they have created the secret to the most natural-looking curl possible. Known as the wand for the adventurous curl-seeker, the Pearl is perfect for blending curls into an already natural wave, pairing with colorful styles, and experimenting with long, free-flowing, wild curls.

Product.Name: Argan Oil
Product.Description: NuMe believes in nothing less than providing the most nourishing and nutritionally beneficial treatments to protect and beautify your hair. Argan Oil is the magic element in any nourishing hair routine. Apply the non-greasy formula to hair when dry to give additional shine. Or smooth through tresses prior to applying heat, to tame frizz or flyaways. The benefits of use are endless; radiant shine, and full and healthy damage-free tresses from the inside-out.

Product.Name: White Truffle Conditioner
Product.Description: Utilizing the world’s most exclusive ingredients for optimum hair health and beauty is what NuMe stands for. Revitalize severely damaged tresses with the power of white truffle extract, one of the most hydrating resources on the planet. Combined with nourishing B vitamins, calcium, potassium, magnesium, and multiple fruit and flower extracts, tresses will feel 100% fuller and at their strongest.

Product.Name: White Truffle Hair Mask
Product.Description: Also called white diamonds, white truffle is one of the most exclusive and rare ingredients found on Earth. Renew and protect your hair against past and future damage with the maximum hydration and nutrient infusion of the White Truffle Hair Mask. Cover your hair in the mask for 20 minutes, and follow with a regular shampoo and conditioning; your hair will show signs of repair immediately with one use, and gain a surge of moisture lost from excessive styling and coloring.

Product.Name: White Truffle Hair Serum
Product.Description: Also called white diamonds, white truffle is one of the most exclusive and rare ingredients found on Earth. NuMe has gathered the sought-after ingredient and combined it with the strength of vitamin E and the maximum hydrating benefits of fruit and berry extracts. The result is a majorly glossy finish and superior protection for your regularly heat-styled locks.

Product.Name: White Truffle Leave-In Conditioner
Product.Description: Maximum hydration occurs when you nourish your hair with the power of white truffle, one of the most hydrating resources in the world. The White Truffle Leave-in Conditioner also contains silk amino acids, known for their ability to bind and absorb into the hair shaft. Keratin A and argan oil help to strengthen and nourish every lock.

Product.Name: White Truffle Shampoo
Product.Description: Hydration has never felt so deliciously decadent. NuMe, the leader in hair health and beauty, has combined the penetrating moisture of white truffle and enhanced the rare ingredient by adding the supreme hydrating elements of black orchid, jasmine and evening primrose, which immerse the scalp and hair shaft in maximum softness.

Product.Name: White Truffle Collection
Product.Description: Allow your hair to indulge in White Truffle, one of the most naturally hydrating resources in the world. Featured in every product within the collection, instantly transform dry, brittle, hair into soft and manageable locks with the rich source of B Vitamins, Calcium, Potassium, and Magnesium, while infusing hair with powerful antioxidants and protein to strengthen hair, reverse damage, and help prevent split ends. All products within the collection hold the powerful hair promises, and capabilities listed above.

Product.Name: Signature Dryer
Product.Description: The Signature Dryer is the official dryer of stylists and industry professionals. If you’re seeking a perfectly smooth and glossy blowout while infusing moisture back into your hair, look no further. Cutting-edge negative ion technology and the latest advancements in ergonomic design are behind the power of the Signature Dryer, providing your hair with strength, major volume, and a seriously luminous shine.

Product.Name: Titan 3
Product.Description: The strong, 100% titanium barrel found in the Titan 3 is the top choice and most widely used styling tool of celebrity stylists and hair professionals world-wide. The pure titanium-infused barrels in 19mm, 25mm, and 32mm, are built for hair that has difficulty holding a curl, imparting the longest-lasting hold possible. For tight curls and waves, a beachy-texture or the perfect bounce – Titan 3 is your premiere choice. Heat-resistant glove included.

Product.Name: MegaStar
Product.Description: <i>Rated Best in Beauty Tools!</i><br></br> A leader in cutting-edge styling tools, NuMe has designed a flat iron with an infrared heat strip built into its tourmaline-infused ceramic coated plates. The strip comes into direct contact with hair, emitting 1000% more negative ions for best-in-class shine and sleekness without damage or dryness. Megastar delivers ionic pin-straight tresses or tousled waves with an incomparable shine and lasting hold.

Product.Name: Magic Wand 19MM
Product.Description: Experience the ultimate transformation and bold statement-making curls of the Magic Wand, made of 100% pure titanium. With an unrivaled heating capacity, there is nothing stronger than high-quality titanium, the only choice for thick, hard-to-curl hair. The most superior hold imaginable and curls that never fall flat is the styling result of the 19mm Magic Wand, your go-to tool for ringlets, spirals and beach waves.

Product.Name: Magic Wand 25MM
Product.Description: Experience the ultimate transformation and bold statement-making curls of the Magic Wand, made of 100% pure Titanium. The 25mm Magic Wand is a curling superstar with major styling versatility, crafting bombshell curls, beach waves, romantic updos and natural-looking curls with professional precision.

Product.Name: Magic Wand 32MM
Product.Description: Experience the ultimate transformation and bold statement-making curls of the Magic Wand, made of 100% pure titanium. The 32mm Magic Wand is perfect for creating sculptural, smooth waves and big, loose curls. Look no further for a styling tool that works on hair types ranging from medium to thick into beautiful, glossy dream-come-true curls.

Product.Name: Lustrum
Product.Description: <i>Rated Highest in Versatility and Performance!</i> For the NuMe girl who has to have it all, and then some. The Lustrum set includes five different, interchangeable, 100% tourmaline-infused ceramic coated barrels; each with the ability to create the most versatile curls and waves imaginable. Tourmaline technology means 600% more negative ions are disbursed into hair, sealing in natural moisture and providing the most superior shine to tight, medium-width, or loose, tumbling curls. Heat-resistant glove included.

Product.Name: Classic Wand 19MM
Product.Description: The 19mm Classic Wand perfects the look of tight curls, ringlets and vintage-inspired styles while adding major texture and volume to short and mid-length hair. Curl each lock of hair with the precision of top stylists and industry professionals. Negative ions are disbursed through the tourmaline-infused ceramic coated barrel, conditioning hair for the ultimate in softness and shine.

Product.Name: Empress
Product.Description: Using real diamonds to create stunningly-straight styles, NuMe presents the most luxurious flat iron yet, the Empress. Diamonds are sprinkled onto the ceramic coated plates of the Empress, a precision flat iron that outshines any before it. The glistening plates are keratin-infused, adding nourishing protein to each lock, making hair appear fuller, shinier, and more lustrous than ever.

Product.Name: Microfiber Hair Wrap
Product.Description: A hair wrap made from lightweight 100% microfiber easily absorbs excess moisture, resulting in less split ends, zero frizz, and stronger, shinier hair. The 100% microfiber towel with button-loop closure combats the daily use of excess heat by absorbing 80% more moisture than a cotton towel would.

Product.Name: Endless Summer
Product.Description: Create the coolest dos during the warmest season of the year and beyond! Eight interchangeable curling wands and a straightener with cutting-edge technology give your countless options!

Product.Name: Heat It Up
Product.Description: Hot summer styles are possible with a hair care trio that beats the heat and humidity in style. No F word (frizz) here, only beautiful blowouts, bouncy curls and super shiny styles all season long.

Product.Name: Summer Love
Product.Description: Have your curls and straighten, too! Totally own the summer with four flexible styles. The infamous Titan 3 and Megastar are the go-to set for creating your own signature style – from sleek and straight to super curly.

Product.Name: Metallic Slate
Product.Description: Turn up your nail game with a cool chrome in gunmetal grey.

Product.Name: Starry Night
Product.Description: It’s glam rock for your nails. The edgy polish is lightly texturized with a matte finish and dusted with gold shimmer.

Product.Name: Inky Noir
Product.Description: It’s your LBD for nails; A staple color in your closet that should also live on your nails.

Product.Name: Prismatic Pieces
Product.Description: Start a party with confetti at your fingertips! The lustrous bits can top any polish or be worn alone, with iridescent flecks that are easily removed.

Product.Name: Opal
Product.Description: Brilliance in a bottle. The blend includes genuine iridescent pigment that beautifully transcends polishes of its class.

Product.Name: Shimmering Star
Product.Description: Disco-ball silver glitter starts a dance rebellion on its own, or works as a brilliant topper with the spotlight always on you. Our glitters are easy to remove and have remarkable staying power for convenience and long-lasting wear.

Product.Name: Fluorescent Orange
Product.Description: Go bold or go home. This punchy neon will get you noticed. Our Neons have a matte finish without a glossy top coat and look great on any skin tone.

Product.Name: Cyber Yellow
Product.Description: Amp up your nail swag with lightening bolt color. It’s like your favorite neon crayon but for your nails! Our Neons have a matte finish without a glossy top coat and look great on any skin tone.

Product.Name: Shock Wave
Product.Description: Take charge in electric blue; Your nail A-game requires something that will be remembered. Our Neons have a matte finish without a glossy top coat and look great on any skin tone.

Product.Name: Dusty Rose
Product.Description: An updated version of your new go-to polish is fit for an English garden or the next party.

Product.Name: Soft Taupe
Product.Description: Score a perfect 10 every time with a naturally subdued clay-brown. It complements any skin tone and coordinates with both cutoff shorts and cocktail dresses.

Product.Name: TuTu
Product.Description: A staple for your nail stash, this blushing rose doesn’t streak and covers in two coats.

Product.Name: Gold Leaf
Product.Description: Heart of bold. Wearable, gilded nails that are as expressive as you are and last as long as you do.

Product.Name: Silver Chrome
Product.Description: Magnetic manis are handed to you on a silver plate with cutting-edge style.

Product.Name: Blue Steel
Product.Description: Your lethal weapon for hyped-up daggers. It’s posed to walk the runway or strengthen your nail style.

Product.Name: Iced Pistachio
Product.Description: This girly green is as sweet as key lime pie and as cool as mochi ice cream.

Product.Name: Powder Blue
Product.Description: This powder-puff performer is as precious as it is chic.

Product.Name: Very Violet
Product.Description: Featherweight lilac polish that blossoms with vintage inspired style.

Product.Name: Flower Petal
Product.Description: Pink yourself up with this perfect rose. It’s not too bright and not too light—it’s unicorn-like.

Product.Name: Baby Pink
Product.Description: Prettify your tips with a bubblegum soft shade.

Product.Name: Girls Night
Product.Description: Happy times with this shimmering fuchsia—and a great accessory to dance the night away with.

Product.Name: Heart
Product.Description: Sweeten your nail routine with Valentine’s Day red.

Product.Name: Vixen’s Lips
Product.Description: Blow a kiss with the perfect rosy hue.

Product.Name: Rich Bordeaux
Product.Description: Leave a lasting impression with a rich, boudoir red that takes you from day to night.

Product.Name: White Out
Product.Description: White paint is a must for your nail arsenal. The quintessential color of today works hard for all of your nail needs: French tips, shocking nail art, and as a base for neons that pop!

Product.Name: Icicle
Product.Description: Beautiful, twinkling tips are achieved with a brush of shimmering glass.

Product.Name: Vanilla Icing
Product.Description: The rich silky finish of this dove-like glaze is irresistible.

Product.Name: DÉCOR
Product.Description: Your options for awesome nails just tripled with our fave nail art toppers that thrill, glitter and sparkle.

Product.Name: NEONS
Product.Description: Electrifying color sparks lasting impressions with our dynamic Neons trio. Get knockout nails in today’s real-deal neon pigments—with or without a white base coat. Our Neons have a matte finish without a glossy top coat and look great on any skin tone.

Product.Name: NUDES
Product.Description: Grab your latte and go with one of these smart sophisticates that rise to any occasion. The performing palette of modern neutrals go everywhere with everything.

Product.Name: BLACKS
Product.Description: Metropolis meets moto jacket with this ride or die trio of pitchy colors.

Product.Name: METALS
Product.Description: The powerhouse of chromatic colors. The three foils are heavy on style and rockin’ on fun, revealing modern manis.

Product.Name: PINKS
Product.Description: The cheeky hues your BFFs will be asking to borrow. We pinky swear that this blushing trio will paint brilliant nails.

Product.Name: PASTELS
Product.Description: Soft layers of cashmere-like colorations create light looks. Each powdery lacquer comes with a glossy finish.

Product.Name: WHITES
Product.Description: A wholesome threesome of alabaster tones are white haute on modern tips.

Product.Name: REDS
Product.Description: The Reds Collection has you covered for timeless-diva style to daily cherry-pop color. They’re your go-tos for Hollywood glamour and city charm.

Product.Name: All Tressed Up
Product.Description: Turn up your look with the salon-powered Signature Dryer and very versatile three-in-one curling wand plus flat iron in the Curl Jam styling set. This combination creates any type of hair personality: cool beach-girl waves, haute runway-worthy strands, and flirty doll-like curls. You’ll be ready for any and every occasion.

Product.Name: Travel Set
Product.Description: The essential NuMe Travel Kit conveniently includes everything you need for beauty on-the-go. Straight styles, wow waves and natural-looking curls are effortlessly created with the Ionic Dryer, 1” Curling Wand with interchangeable barrel, and the 100% Tourmaline Straightener.
